name: VR GAME-Brick of War 魔块战争
description: VR GAME-Brick Of War is an VR shooting game that is suitable for any age player,Players need to challenge monsters from all sides in the game. There are plenty of monsters and they have different forms of attack.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows 7,8,10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590,AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970、AMD Radeon™ R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 10 Processor: Intel® i5-4590,AMD FX 8350 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce® GTX 970、AMD Radeon™ R9 290 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space
